short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HEMTT Extension for viewing PAA files in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View Arma 3's PAA image files directly on GitHub.

If you don't know what a PAA is, don't install this. Don't bother learning either, you will only find this is you know what a PAA is first.
